In this vignette, we will go over various clustering methods, going in detail into the methodology and the process to give you the tools to perform clustering for machine learning applications.
Objectives: Learn clustering methods, when and why to use them. Introduce hierarchical clustering and compare the benefits and downsides.

### Setup
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
wine <- read_csv('data/winequality-white.csv')
```
